actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to repeal the provisions of law prohibiting female members of the Navy and Air Force from being assigned to duty on vessels or in aircraft that are engaged in combat missions.

summary.text: Repeals the provisions of law which prohibit female members of the Navy and Air Force from being assigned to duty on vessels or in aircraft engaged in combat missions.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to repeal the provisions of law prohibiting female members of the Navy and Air Force from being assigned to duty on vessels or in aircraft that are engaged in combat missions.
